scripts.client:start:development: npm run client:env:development && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start dotenv_config_path=$PWD/.env
scripts.client:start:test: npm run client:env:test && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start dotenv_config_path=$PWD/.env
scripts.client:start:production: npm run client:env:production && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start dotenv_config_path=$PWD/.env
scripts.client:build:development: npm run client:env:development && react-scripts --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=8192 build && npm run build:version
scripts.client:build:test: npm run client:env:test && npm run client:htaccess:test && react-scripts --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=8192 build && npm run build:version && mv .htaccess ./build
scripts.client:build:production: npm run client:env:production && npm run client:htaccess:production && react-scripts --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=8192 build && mv .htaccess ./build
scripts.build:version: npm run build:version:id && npm run build:version:date && npm run build:author
scripts.build:author: BUILD_AUTHOR=$(git config --global user.email) && sed -i -- 's/%BUILD_AUTHOR%/'$BUILD_AUTHOR'/g' ./build/index.html
